input_args.text: 'by Yves Smith \nThis unprecedented election season is finally coming to a close. Join us for commentary and discussion as the results roll in. \nLambert will kick off the election night live blog at 8:30 PM tomorrow evening. With the presidency and the Senate majority in play, there’s a lot to watch. The presidential and vice presidential live blogs were lively, so we expect another evening of incisive and often humorous conversation. 0 0 0 0 0 0'
